body:
Simply asking what should i export/render my videos (like games - MC, CSGO, Osu,etc.) to?

- AVI
- MPEG4
- other option?

???
body_tagged:

- AVI

- other option?

???
title: Best Export/Save Option for Premiere Pro?

replies.body: AVI is the best quality but your files will get very, very big. So if you want to go for some real quality, take .avi.
replies.body_tagged: AVI is the best quality but your files will get very, very big. So if you want to go for some real quality, take .avi.
